trans-unit.resname: AFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Galea, Kindler of Hope
trans-unit.target: 燃望者盖莉娅

trans-unit.resname: AFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nYou may look at the top card of your library any time.\nYou may cast Aura and Equipment spells from the top of your library. When you cast an Equipment spell this way, it gains "When this Equipment enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control."
trans-unit.target: 警戒 你可以随时检视你的牌库顶牌。 你可以从你的牌库顶施放灵气和武具咒语。当你以此法施放武具咒语时，它获得「当此武具进战场时，将它贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Prosper, Tome-Bound
trans-unit.target: 书契坡斯博

trans-unit.resname: AFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nMystic Arcanum — At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.\nPact Boon — Whenever you play a card from exile, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 死触 玄奥秘法～在你的结束步骤开始时，放逐你的牌库顶牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用该牌。 魔契之赐～每当你从放逐区使用牌时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sefris of the Hidden Ways
trans-unit.target: 密宗法师塞弗莉丝

trans-unit.resname: AFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, venture into the dungeon. This ability triggers only once each turn. (To venture into the dungeon, enter the first room or advance to the next room.)\nCreate Undead — Whenever you complete a dungeon, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当一张或数张生物牌从任何区域进入你的坟墓场时，深入地城。此异能每回合只会触发一次。（深入地城的流程是进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。） 唤起死灵～每当你完成地城时，将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you may create a 5/4 red and green Dragon Spirit creature token with "When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it."\nWhenever you roll one or more dice, you may have Vrondiss deal 1 damage to itself.
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，你可以派出一个5/4，红绿双色的龙／精怪衍生生物，且具有「当此生物造成伤害时，将它牺牲。」 每当你掷一颗或数颗骰子时，你可以使沃隆迪斯对本身造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, another target attacking creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.\nWhenever a creature or planeswalker you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，另一个目标由你操控且进行攻击的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。 每当一个由你操控的生物或鹏洛客成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，你可以抓一张牌。

When they do, exile the top card of their library.

trans-unit.target: 飞行 弃一张牌：CARDNAME获得辟邪异能直到回合结束。将之横置。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，占卜3。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·91 | Propaganda | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Propaganda
trans-unit.target: 宣导

trans-unit.resname: AFC·91 | Propaganda | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{2}，否则它不能攻击你。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·91 | Propaganda | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits."\n—Nekusar, the Mindrazer
trans-unit.target: 「你反抗的代价将从你的智慧中萃取。」 ～毁灵师奈库萨

trans-unit.resname: AFC·92 | Psychic Impetus | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Psychic Impetus
trans-unit.target: 心灵促动

trans-unit.resname: AFC·92 | Psychic Impetus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)\nWhenever enchanted creature attacks, you scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物得+2/+2且已煽惑。（它每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击，且若能攻击除你以外的牌手，则必须如此作。） 每当所结附的生物攻击时，你占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·93 | Riverwise Augur | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Riverwise Augur
trans-unit.target: 通流卜算师

trans-unit.resname: AFC·93 | Riverwise Augur | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，抓三张牌，然后将两张牌从你手上以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·93 | Riverwise Augur | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."
trans-unit.target: 「时间就如这滔滔江水，奔流向前汇聚入海。智者知晓该在下流探寻。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·94 | Serum Visions | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Serum Visions
trans-unit.target: 浆液预视

trans-unit.resname: AFC·94 | Serum Visions | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card. Scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。占卜2。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·94 | Serum Visions | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.
trans-unit.target: 原本采自秘罗地光蛾的浆液，可让饮者眼中见得启悟。如今浆液萃自非瑞克西亚墨蛾，能令受者眼中得见完美。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·95 | Chittering Witch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chittering Witch
trans-unit.target: 吱响巫婆

trans-unit.resname: AFC·95 | Chittering Witch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 black Rat creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.\n{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出若干1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物，其数量等同于你的对手数量。 {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：目标生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·96 | Consuming Vapors | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Consuming Vapors
trans-unit.target: 化骨毒气

trans-unit.resname: AFC·96 | Consuming Vapors | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.\nRebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个生物。你获得等同于该生物防御力的生命。 弹回（如果你从你手上施放此咒语，于它结算时将之放逐。在你的下一个维持开始时，你可以从放逐区施放此牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·97 | Dead Man's Chest | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dead Man's Chest
trans-unit.target: 死魂棺

trans-unit.resname: AFC·97 | Dead Man's Chest | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature an opponent controls\nWhen enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast spells from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.
trans-unit.target: 结附于由对手操控的生物 当所结附的生物死去时，放逐其拥有者牌库顶的若干牌，其数量等同于该生物的力量。于这些牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以从其中施放咒语，且你可以将法术力视同任意种类的法术力来支付施放这些咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·98 | Doomed Necromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Doomed Necromancer
trans-unit.target: 败亡死灵术士

trans-unit.resname: AFC·98 | Doomed Necromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {B}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·98 | Doomed Necromancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many necromancers share the same last words—the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.
trans-unit.target: 许多死灵术士的遗言是同一句～用来结束亡物仪式的那句。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·99 | Fiend of the Shadows | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fiend of the Shadows
trans-unit.target: 阴影邪鬼

trans-unit.resname: AFC·99 | Fiend of the Shadows | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled.\nSacrifice a Human: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，该牌手从其手上放逐一张牌。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以使用该牌。 牺牲一个人类：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·100 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
trans-unit.target: 奢华领主贡提

trans-unit.resname: AFC·100 | Gonti, Lord of Luxury | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.
trans-unit.target: 死触 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视目标对手牌库顶的四张牌，将其中一张牌面朝下地放逐，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于该牌库底。于该牌持续放逐的时段内，你可以检视并施放该牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意种类的法术力来支付施放该咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·101 | Hex | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hex
trans-unit.target: 六方杀阵

trans-unit.resname: AFC·101 | Hex | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy six target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭六个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·101 | Hex | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When killing five just isn't enough.
trans-unit.target: 有时候杀五个还不够。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·102 | Marionette Master | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Marionette Master
trans-unit.target: 弄偶大师

trans-unit.resname: AFC·102 | Marionette Master | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Fabricate 3 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)\nWhenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to CARDNAME's power.
trans-unit.target: 装配3（当此生物进战场时，在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物或派出三个1/1无色自动机衍生神器生物。） 每当一个由你操控的神器从战场进入坟墓场时，目标对手失去等同于CARDNAME力量的生命。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·103 | Necromantic Selection | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Necromantic Selection
trans-unit.target: 物尽天择

trans-unit.resname: AFC·103 | Necromantic Selection | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物，然后将一张以此法进入坟墓场的生物牌在你的操控下移回战场。它额外具有黑色此颜色与灵俑此类别。放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·103 | Necromantic Selection | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.
trans-unit.target: 残灰散尽，骨骸落定，它自混沌中蹒跚而出，饶是自身灭绝也未能惊动分毫。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ogre Slumlord
trans-unit.target: 贫窟霸食人魔

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.\nRats you control have deathtouch.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个非衍生物的生物死去时，你可以派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。 由你操控的老鼠具有死触异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·104 | Ogre Slumlord | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."\n—Branko One-Ear
trans-unit.target: 「他的居所充满最邪恶恶心的病媒，还有鼠辈横行。」 ～单耳布兰可

trans-unit.resname: AFC·105 | Phthisis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Phthisis
trans-unit.target: 痨病

trans-unit.resname: AFC·105 | Phthisis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to its power plus its toughness.\nSuspend 5—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。其操控者失去等同于其力量与防御力加总的生命。 延缓5～{1}{B}（除了从你手上施放此牌，你可以支付{1}{B}并将它放逐，且上面有五个计时指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Piper of the Swarm
trans-unit.target: 鼠群魔笛手

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Rats you control have menace.\n{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.\n{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的老鼠具有威慑异能。 {1}{B}，{T}：派出一个1/1黑色老鼠衍生生物。 {2}{B}{B}，{T}，牺牲三个老鼠：获得目标生物的操控权。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·106 | Piper of the Swarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."
trans-unit.target: 「只要它有耳朵，就会随着我的旋律起舞。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·107 | Plaguecrafter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plaguecrafter
trans-unit.target: 播疫师

trans-unit.resname: AFC·107 | Plaguecrafter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，每位牌手各牺牲一个生物或鹏洛客。每位无法如此作的牌手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·107 | Plaguecrafter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."
trans-unit.target: 「我的能力可谓慷慨。我让从我手下幸存的人对生命心怀感恩。」

trans-unit.resname: AFC·108 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Pontiff of Blight
trans-unit.target: 枯萎主教

trans-unit.resname: AFC·108 | Pontiff of Blight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)\nOther creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)
trans-unit.target: 敲诈（每当你施放咒语时，你可以支付{W/B}。若你如此作，则每位对手各失去1点生命，且你获得等量的生命。） 由你操控的其他生物具有敲诈异能。（若某生物具有数个敲诈异能，则每一个都会分别触发。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·109 | Reassembling Skeleton | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Reassembling Skeleton
trans-unit.target: 重组骷髅妖

trans-unit.resname: AFC·109 | Reassembling Skeleton | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·109 | Reassembling Skeleton | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「他们现身时可能装错了大腿骨或颔骨，但他们总是会现身。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.resname: AFC·110 | Shriekmaw | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shriekmaw
trans-unit.target: 尖吼怪

trans-unit.resname: AFC·110 | Shriekmaw | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.\nEvoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)
trans-unit.target: 恐惧（此生物只能被神器生物和／或黑色生物阻挡。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，消灭目标非神器且非黑色的生物。 呼魂{1}{B}（你可以支付此咒语的呼魂费用来施放它。若你如此作，当它进战场时便牺牲之。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Unburial Rites
trans-unit.target: 掀坟仪式

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.\nFlashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 返照{3}{W}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: AFC·111 | Unburial Rites | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.
trans-unit.target: 大家都祈求着受福安眠。很少人能够蒙福。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·112 | Victimize | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Victimize
trans-unit.target: 生体活祭

trans-unit.resname: AFC·112 | Victimize | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选之牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·112 | Victimize | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."\n—Zul Ashur, lich lord
trans-unit.target: 「去死吧。知道你这悲惨的一生能为我换回莫大回报，你也死得明白。」 ～巫妖领主祝亚许

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Anger
trans-unit.target: 愤怒

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nAs long as CARDNAME is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: 敏捷 只要CARDNAME在你的坟墓场，并且你操控山脉，由你操控的生物便具有敏捷异能。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·113 | Anger | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."\n—Koth of the Hammer
trans-unit.target: 「炽焰大地本身不会愤怒。唯有你将自身怒气倾注当中后，其岩浆方能翻滚成形。」 ～锤族的寇斯

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Apex of Power
trans-unit.target: 无上力量

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.\nIf this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的七张牌。直到回合结束，你可以从其中施放咒语。 如果此咒语是从你手上施放，则加十点任意颜色的单色法术力。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·114 | Apex of Power | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As I desire, so it shall be."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「吾之所欲，必能成型。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.resname: AFC·115 | Bogardan Hellkite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bogardan Hellkite
trans-unit.target: 博卡登残虐者

trans-unit.resname: AFC·115 | Bogardan Hellkite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，它对任意数量的目标造成共5点伤害，你可以任意分配。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·116 | Chain Reaction | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chain Reaction
trans-unit.target: 连锁反应

trans-unit.resname: AFC·116 | Chain Reaction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个生物各造成X点伤害，X为战场上的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·116 | Chain Reaction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."\n—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain
trans-unit.target: 「我们的训练是要应付不可能的事，例如闪电两次都落在同一个地方，或是一次落在所有地方。」 ～海户义勇军队长努达力

trans-unit.resname: AFC·117 | Chaos Warp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Chaos Warp
trans-unit.target: 混沌歪曲

trans-unit.resname: AFC·117 | Chaos Warp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标永久物。其拥有者将它洗入其牌库，然后展示其牌库顶牌。如果该牌是永久物牌，则该牌手将它放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·118 | Commune with Lava | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Commune with Lava
trans-unit.target: 熔岩通贯

trans-unit.resname: AFC·118 | Commune with Lava | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
trans-unit.target: 放逐你牌库顶的X张牌。直到你下一个回合的回合结束，你可以使用这些牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·118 | Commune with Lava | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.
trans-unit.target: 很久以前，安塔卡征服了圜焰克达，凭借将火焰荣光传扬世界的许诺赢得了魔神的支持。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·119 | Dark-Dweller Oracle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dark-Dweller Oracle
trans-unit.target: 暗栖先知

trans-unit.resname: AFC·119 | Dark-Dweller Oracle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}，牺牲一个生物：放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·119 | Dark-Dweller Oracle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.
trans-unit.target: 预见未来不需用眼。

trans-unit.resname: AFC·120 | Demanding Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Demanding Dragon
trans-unit.target: 索祭巨龙

trans-unit.resname: AFC·120 | Demanding Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.

trans-unit.resname: AFR·38 | Steadfast Paladin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lifelink
trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: AFR·38 | Steadfast Paladin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When I made my oath to Moradin, I left selfishness and cowardice behind. Every battle, I make that commitment anew."
trans-unit.target: 「当我向摩拉丁起誓时，就早已将自私与怯懦抛诸脑后。每次战斗，都让我能重温誓言。」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·39 | Teleportation Circle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Teleportation Circle
trans-unit.target: 传送法阵

trans-unit.resname: AFR·39 | Teleportation Circle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, exile up to one target artifact or creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，放逐至多一个目标由你操控的神器或生物，然后将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·39 | Teleportation Circle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hold on to your lunch!"\n—Bartleby, gnome wizard
trans-unit.target: 「拿稳你的午餐！」 ～地侏法师巴托比

trans-unit.resname: AFR·40 | Veteran Dungeoneer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Veteran Dungeoneer
trans-unit.target: 老练地城专家

trans-unit.resname: AFR·40 | Veteran Dungeoneer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，深入地城。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·40 | Veteran Dungeoneer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Her tales of glory light a fire in the souls of the next generation of adventurers.
trans-unit.target: 她的光辉事迹，点燃了后辈冒险者心中的激情。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·41 | White Dragon | Card Name
trans-unit.source: White Dragon
trans-unit.target: 白龙

trans-unit.resname: AFR·41 | White Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCold Breath — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 寒冷喷吐～当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·41 | White Dragon | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: White dragons are unparalleled hunters, keenly focused on slaughtering their enemies.
trans-unit.target: 白龙是无匹猎手，专注于如何杀死猎物。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·42 | You Hear Something on Watch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: You Hear Something on Watch
trans-unit.target: 你放哨时听到声响

trans-unit.resname: AFR·42 | You Hear Something on Watch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Rouse the Party — Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.\n• Set Off Traps — This spell deals 5 damage to target attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •叫醒队伍～由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。 •启动陷阱～此咒语对目标进行攻击的生物造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·43 | You're Ambushed on the Road | Card Name
trans-unit.source: You're Ambushed on the Road
trans-unit.target: 你在路上遭遇伏击

trans-unit.resname: AFR·43 | You're Ambushed on the Road | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Make a Retreat — Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.\n• Stand and Fight — Target creature gets +1/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •试图撤退～将目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。 •原地还击～目标生物得+1/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·43 | You're Ambushed on the Road | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Hand over your loot and no one gets hurt!"
trans-unit.target: 「把宝藏留下，可保人人平安！」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·44 | Aberrant Mind Sorcerer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Psionic Spells — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard, then roll a d20.\n1—9 | You may put that card on top of your library.\n10—20 | Return that card to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 灵能咒语～当CARDNAME进战场时，选择目标在你坟墓场中的瞬间或法术牌，然后掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 你可以将该牌置于你的牌库顶。 10～20 | 将该牌移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·45 | Air-Cult Elemental | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Elemental Evil distorts the natural elements, limiting them to aspects of destruction.
trans-unit.target: 邪恶元素将自然元素尽数扭曲，令其只余破坏之途。

trans-unit.source: Search the Room — {5}{U}: Roll a d20.\n1—9 | Draw a card.\n10—20 | Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 搜索房间～{5}{U}：掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 抓一张牌。 10～20 | 检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.source: This spell costs {U} less to cast for each instant and sorcery spell you've cast this turn.\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, exile up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy.\nYou may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard by exiling four instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.
trans-unit.target: 你本回合中每施放过一个瞬间和法术咒语，此咒语便减少{U}来施放。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，将至多一张目标瞬间或法术牌从你的坟墓场放逐。将其复制。你可以施放该复制品。 你可以从你的坟墓场中施放CARDNAME，但在其他费用以外，还须从你的坟墓场放逐四张瞬间和／或法术牌。

You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

trans-unit.resname: AFR·69 | Rimeshield Frost Giant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Frost giants carry the trophies of their greatest victories into battle, fashioned into armor of strength and savage beauty.
trans-unit.target: 霜巨人会将他们最伟大胜利的奖赏制成展现力量与野性之美的护甲，并穿戴它们冲上战场。

trans-unit.source: Scion of Stygia
trans-unit.target: 悲憎地狱后裔

trans-unit.resname: AFR·70 | Scion of Stygia | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flash
Cone of Cold — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose target creature an opponent controls, then roll a d20.
1—9 | Tap that creature.
10—20 | Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 寒冰锥～当CARDNAME进战场时，选择目标由对手操控的生物，然后掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 横置该生物。 10～20 | 横置该生物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·71 | Secret Door | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Secret Door
trans-unit.target: 密门

trans-unit.resname: AFR·71 | Secret Door | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{4}{U}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 守军 {4}{U}：深入地城。只能于法术时机起动。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·71 | Secret Door | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The way opened before him, and the dust of centuries stirred in the air.
trans-unit.target: 道路在面前洞开，数百年的灰尘在空中飘舞。

trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-2/-0直到回合结束。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·72 | Shocking Grasp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Metal armor? A poor choice."
trans-unit.target: 「金属盔甲？算你倒霉。」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·73 | Shortcut Seeker | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 捷径探寻者

trans-unit.resname: AFR·73 | Shortcut Seeker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，深入地城。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·73 | Shortcut Seeker | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ah, the old 'trap door under a rug' trick. This is almost too easy."
trans-unit.target: 「啊，『地毯下活板门』的老把戏。这个太简单了。」

trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·74 | Silver Raven | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Wings take flight on whispered wind.
trans-unit.target: 在萧瑟寒风中展翅飞翔。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·75 | Soulknife Spy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soulknife Spy
trans-unit.target: 魂刃者探子

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·75 | Soulknife Spy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My psychic blade cuts the mind and severs thoughts. Even if you survive, you'll never remember I was here."
trans-unit.target: 「我的心灵利刃能切割意识，斩断思想。就算你侥幸存活，你也不会记得我曾来过。」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·76 | Split the Party | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 选择目标牌手。将一半数量由其操控的生物移回其拥有者手上，小数点后进位。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·76 | Split the Party | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Don't.
trans-unit.target: 别。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·77 | Sudden Insight | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sudden Insight
trans-unit.target: 豁然领悟

trans-unit.resname: AFR·77 | Sudden Insight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card for each different mana value among nonland cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的非地牌间每有一种不同的法术力值，便抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·77 | Sudden Insight | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A lucky draw from the Deck of Many Things gave Voltusk an inexplicable flash of understanding that he spent the rest of his life trying to repeat.
trans-unit.target: 万象无常牌的幸运一抽，让沃图克眼前闪过难以解释的一幕：他将耗尽余生想要重现这一情景。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·78 | Tasha's Hideous Laughter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
trans-unit.target: 塔莎狂笑术

trans-unit.resname: AFR·78 | Tasha's Hideous Laughter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until that player has exiled cards with total mana value 20 or more.
trans-unit.target: 每位对手各进行以下流程～从其牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到所放逐之牌的法术力值总和为20或更多为止。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·78 | Tasha's Hideous Laughter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The raging behir reared back, opened its terrible maw . . . and collapsed in a fit of horrifying giggles.
trans-unit.target: 愤怒的青足龙蛇向后一跃，张开了血盆巨口…随即因自己的骇人狂笑而无力他顾。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·80 | True Polymorph | Flavor Text

(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)
You have no maximum hand size.

When this Class becomes level 2, draw two cards.

Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

trans-unit.source:
{T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Roll a d20. Activate only as a sorcery.
1—9 | Copy that card. You may cast the copy.
10—19 | Copy that card. You may cast the copy by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost.
20 | Copy each card exiled with CARDNAME. You may cast any number of the copies without paying their mana costs.
trans-unit.target: {T}：将目标瞬间或法术牌从坟墓场放逐。掷一颗d20。只能于法术时机起动。 1～9 | 复制该牌。你可以施放该复制品。 10～19 | 复制该牌。你可以施放该复制品，但须支付{1}，而非支付其法术力费用。 20 | 复制所有以CARDNAME放逐的牌。你可以施放任意数量的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •强渡急流～将目标非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 •绕路通过～目标生物得+1/+0直到回合结束，且本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，若你未曾完成湮灭之墓，则将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上并深入地城。 每当CARDNAME攻击时，对每位对手而言，除非该牌手牺牲一个生物，否则你派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 魔鬼契约～如果你将抓一张牌，改为牌面朝下地放逐你的牌库顶牌。 {B}{B}{B}：抓七张牌。 {B}：将所有以CARDNAME放逐的牌移回其拥有者手上，且你失去等量的生命。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •防魔法锥～每位对手各牺牲一个结界。 •恐惧射线～由你操控的生物获得威慑异能直到回合结束。（具威慑异能的生物只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中失去了2点或更多生命，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。 {T}，放逐CARDNAME和由你操控且名称为威可那法眼与威可那魔手的神器：派出传奇衍生生物威可那，其为8/8黑色，具不灭异能的灵俑／神。它获得所放逐之牌的所有触发式异能。

trans-unit.target: 检查陷阱

trans-unit.resname: AFR·92 | Check for Traps | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. Exile that card. If an instant card or a card with flash is exiled this way, they lose 1 life. Otherwise, you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非地牌。放逐该牌。如果以此法放逐一张瞬间牌或一张具闪现异能的牌，则该对手失去1点生命。若否，则你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·92 | Check for Traps | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: AFR·98 | Drider | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though their forms embody Lolth's image, driders are those unfortunate drow who have failed the Spider Queen.
trans-unit.target: 虽然蛛化精灵外形神似罗丝，但他们其实是令蜘蛛女王蒙羞的不幸卓尔。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·99 | Dungeon Crawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dungeon Crawler
trans-unit.target: 地城匍尸

trans-unit.resname: AFR·99 | Dungeon Crawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\nWhenever you complete a dungeon, you may return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 每当你完成地城时，你可以将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·99 | Dungeon Crawler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I think of it as giving them another chance to achieve their potential."\n—Nestus Wrasse, necromancer
trans-unit.target: 「我把这看作再给他们一次发挥潜能的机会。」 ～死灵术士奈特斯瑞瑟

Flash
Flying
CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.
You may cast CARDNAME from your graveyard if a creature not named CARDNAME died this turn.

trans-unit.resname: AFR·101 | Eyes of the Beholder | Flavor Text

trans-unit.resname: AFR·102 | Fates' Reversal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A doom denied—or, perhaps, delayed.
trans-unit.target: 逃过一劫～或许只是暂时躲过。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·103 | Feign Death | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A drastic measure for dangerous times.

trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物或鹏洛客。派出一个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·106 | Grim Bounty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Freed from the need to pay tribute to the dragon, the villages gladly paid the dragon-slayers instead.
trans-unit.target: 当村民得知不再需要向巨龙进贡后，他们兴高采烈地改为将钱财支付予屠龙勇士。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·107 | Grim Wanderer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There is a stillness that walks with him, the quiet that follows great tragedy, when even the mourners are too exhausted to weep.
trans-unit.target: 他的出现令周围陷入沉寂，这是惨痛悲剧带来的沉痛窒息，就连哀悼者都已因过度伤悲而无力哭泣。

trans-unit.source:
Circle of Death — {5}{B}: Roll a d20.
1—9 | Each opponent loses 2 life.
10—19 | Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
20 | Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
trans-unit.target: 死亡法阵～{5}{B}：掷一颗d20。 1～9 | 每位对手各失去2点生命。 10～19 | 每位对手各失去2点生命，且你获得2点生命。 20 | 每位对手各失去2点生命，且你获得2点生命。派出两个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·109 | Hired Hexblade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I'll take care of it. You just be sure to hold up your end of the deal."
trans-unit.target: 「我会处理好这件事。你只管准备好你要付的那部分。」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·110 | Hoard Robber | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 「仔细想来，一年前我还只是在深水城当扒手的小混混。」

trans-unit.source:
Whenever a creature you control dies, put a loyalty counter on CARDNAME.
[0]: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.
[−3]: Create two 2/1 black Spider creature tokens with menace and reach.
[−8]: You get an emblem with "Whenever an opponent is dealt combat damage by one or more creatures you control, if that player lost less than 8 life this turn, they lose life equal to the difference."
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的生物死去时，在CARDNAME上放置一个忠诚指示物。 0：你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。 −3：派出两个2/1，具威慑与延势异能的蜘蛛衍生生物。 −8：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「每当任一对手受到由你操控之一个或数个生物的战斗伤害时，若该牌手本回合中失去过的生命小于8点，则其失去等同于该差距数量的生命。」

(Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or activate abilities of Dragons.\n{R}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may reveal a Dragon card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加两点法术力，其颜色组合由你选择。此法术力只能用来施放龙咒语，或是起动龙的异能。 {R}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：检视你牌库顶的七张牌。你可以展示其中的一张龙牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·239 | Xanathar, Guild Kingpin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose target opponent. Until end of turn, that player can't cast spells, you may look at the top card of their library any time, you may play the top card of their library, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells this way.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，选择目标对手。直到回合结束，该牌手不能施放咒语，你可以随时检视其牌库顶牌，你可以使用其牌库顶牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来支付以此法施放之咒语的费用。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·240 | Bag of Holding | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bag of Holding
trans-unit.target: 百宝囊

trans-unit.resname: AFR·240 | Bag of Holding | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.\n{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.\n{4}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Return all cards exiled with CARDNAME to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当你弃一张牌时，将该牌从你的坟墓场放逐。 {2}，{T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。 {4}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将所有以CARDNAME放逐的牌移回其拥有者的手上。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·240 | Bag of Holding | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Leave no treasure behind.
trans-unit.target: 一件宝贝都不漏掉。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·241 | The Deck of Many Things | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Deck of Many Things
trans-unit.target: 万象无常牌

trans-unit.resname: AFR·241 | The Deck of Many Things | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
{2}, {T}: Roll a d20 and subtract the number of cards in your hand. If the result is 0 or less, discard your hand.
1—9 | Return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand.
10—19 | Draw two cards.
20 | Put a creature card from any graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When that creature dies, its owner loses the game.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}：掷一颗d20，然后将点数减去你的手牌数量。如果掷骰结果等于或小于0，则弃掉你的手牌。 1～9 | 随机将一张牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 10～19 | 抓两张牌。 20 | 将一张生物牌在你的操控下从任一坟墓场放进战场。当该生物死去时，其拥有者输掉这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·242 | Dungeon Map | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dungeon Map
trans-unit.target: 地城地图

trans-unit.resname: AFR·242 | Dungeon Map | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{3}, {T}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {3}，{T}：深入地城。只能于法术时机起动。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·242 | Dungeon Map | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wait, is that a secret door? I can't tell for sure . . . there's some blood in the way."
trans-unit.target: 「等等，那个是密门吗？我也不确定…不过沿途有血迹。」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·243 | Eye of Vecna | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eye of Vecna
trans-unit.target: 威可那法眼

trans-unit.resname: AFR·243 | Eye of Vecna | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {2}. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你抓一张牌且失去2点生命。 在你的维持开始时，你可以支付{2}。若你如此作，则你抓一张牌且失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·243 | Eye of Vecna | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I see all things as they truly are! I see . . . decay in all flesh, and betrayal in every heart."
trans-unit.target: 「我看到了万物真实样貌！我看到了…所有肉体内的腐朽，以及所有心中的背叛。」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·244 | Fifty Feet of Rope | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Fifty Feet of Rope
trans-unit.target: 五十英尺长绳

trans-unit.resname: AFR·244 | Fifty Feet of Rope | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Climb Over — {T}: Target Wall can't block this turn.\nTie Up — {3}, {T}: Target creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.\nRappel Down — {4}, {T}: Venture into the dungeon. Activate only as a sorcery. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: 攀越～{T}：目标墙本回合不能进行阻挡。 捆绑～{3}，{T}：目标生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 降下～{4}，{T}：深入地城。只能于法术时机起动。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·245 | Greataxe | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Greataxe
trans-unit.target: 巨斧

trans-unit.resname: AFR·245 | Greataxe | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +4/+0.\nEquip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+4/+0。 佩带{5}（{5}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·245 | Greataxe | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If you're so mighty, scaled one, then why are you dead?"
trans-unit.target: 「有鳞片的家伙，如果你真那么厉害，怎么会死呢？」

trans-unit.resname: AFR·246 | Hand of Vecna | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hand of Vecna
trans-unit.target: 威可那魔手

trans-unit.resname: AFR·246 | Hand of Vecna | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, equipped creature or a creature you control named Vecna gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.\nEquip—Pay 1 life for each card in your hand.\nEquip {2}

trans-unit.resname: AFR·247 | Iron Golem | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Iron Golem
trans-unit.target: 铁魔像

trans-unit.resname: AFR·247 | Iron Golem | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Vigilance\nCARDNAME attacks or blocks each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 警戒 CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击或阻挡，则须如此作。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·247 | Iron Golem | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Once an iron golem is set to a task, it won't turn aside until that task is complete or it has been destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦身负任务，铁魔像只有完成任务或者遭破坏才会停下。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·248 | Leather Armor | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 皮甲

trans-unit.resname: AFR·248 | Leather Armor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +0/+1 and has ward {1}. (Whenever equipped creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)\nEquip {0}. Activate only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+0/+1且具有守护{1}。（每当佩带此武具的生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{1}，否则反击之。） 佩带{0}。每回合只能起动一次。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·248 | Leather Armor | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Lightweight, flexible, and protective.
trans-unit.target: 重量轻，灵活性高，保护力强。

trans-unit.target: 拟身怪

trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color.\n{2}: CARDNAME becomes a Shapeshifter artifact creature with base power and toughness 3/3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {2}：CARDNAME成为基础力量与防御力为3/3的变形兽神器生物直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·250 | Spare Dagger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice CARDNAME. When you do, this creature deals 1 damage to any target."\nEquip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+0且具有「每当此生物攻击时，你可以牺牲CARDNAME。当你如此作时，此生物对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。」 佩带{1}（{1}：贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。只能于法术时机佩带。）

trans-unit.source:
Flash
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Choose target creature, then roll a d20.
1—9 | CARDNAME deals 5 damage to that creature.
10—20 | CARDNAME deals 5 damage to that creature. Create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 {5}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：选择目标生物，然后掷一颗d20。 1～9 | CARDNAME对该生物造成5点伤害。 10～20 | CARDNAME对该生物造成5点伤害。派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.target: 宝箱

trans-unit.source:
{4}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Roll a d20.
1 | Trapped! — You lose 3 life.
2—9 | Create five Treasure tokens.
10—19 | You gain 3 life and draw three cards.
20 | Search your library for a card. If it's an artifact card, you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {4}，牺牲CARDNAME：掷一颗d20。 1 | 陷阱！～你失去3点生命。 2～9 | 派出五个珍宝衍生物。 10～19 | 你获得3点生命且抓三张牌。 20 | 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌。如果它是神器牌，则你可以将之放进战场。若否，则将该牌置于你手上。然后洗牌。

It's still a land.
trans-unit.target: 如果你操控两个或更多其他地，则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}。 {3}{R}：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为3/2红色鬼怪生物，且具有「每当此生物攻击时，派出一个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。」它仍然是地。

It's still a land. (Whenever it becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)

It's still a land.

trans-unit.source: There is wealth enough inside to cause the rise and the ruin of dynasties.
trans-unit.target: 其中财富足以主宰王朝兴亡。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·262 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: AFR·262 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You've traced the tensions in Ten-Towns to the dwindling reindeer populations ... but what has been hunting them?
trans-unit.target: 你发现十镇紧张气氛的根源是驯鹿数量减少…但究竟是什么在猎杀它们？

trans-unit.resname: AFR·263 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: AFR·263 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Seeking to learn why the ancestors have fallen silent, you've made your way to their ancient cairns.
trans-unit.target: 你动身前往先祖的古代石冢，想要弄清它们沉默不语的原因。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·264 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: AFR·264 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Searching for a vanished caravan that was bound for Silverymoon, you've come to a bank of mysterious fog.
trans-unit.target: 你听闻一支前往银月城的商队消失无踪，于是动身搜索，不久就遇到一股神秘迷雾。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·265 | Plains | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.resname: AFR·265 | Plains | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Venturing beneath the desert sands, you've discovered an alien power pulsing with inconceivable energy.
trans-unit.target: 你冒险深入黄沙之底，找到一股脉动着不可思议能源的奇异力量。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·266 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: AFR·266 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In crystal-studded waters far below the surface, you've discovered an incubating egg of mysterious origin.
trans-unit.target: 你在布满结晶的水下深处发现一颗蛋，它来源不明，且正在孵化。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·267 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: AFR·267 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After careful study, you've determined that the giant ruins served to track the movement of the planets ... and they will soon align once more.
trans-unit.target: 你经过一番研究，推定这些巨大遗迹是为追踪行星轨迹而建…而它们不久之后即将再次连成一线。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·268 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: AFR·268 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As your ship clears the edge of Waterdeep harbor, you notice pirate sails on the horizon. What has made them so bold?
trans-unit.target: 你的船扫清了深水城港口周遭，此时你注意到海平面上出现海盗船帆影。是什么原因让他们如此放肆？

trans-unit.resname: AFR·269 | Island | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.resname: AFR·269 | Island | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Alarmed by the news you brought, the storm giant king of the Maelstrom has called his kin to council.
trans-unit.target: 你带来的消息警醒了漩涡堡的风暴巨人王，他随即召集族人讨论相关事宜。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·270 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: AFR·270 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As a plague ravages the world above, you've made your way into the Underdark in search of a fungal panacea.
trans-unit.target: 你来到幽暗地域探寻真菌灵药，想为正受瘟疫摧残的地上世界带来生机。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·271 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: AFR·271 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Your search for a stolen artifact has brought you to the edge of the Mere of Dead Men.
trans-unit.target: 你一路探寻遭窃神器，来到了亡者沼泽边缘。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·272 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: AFR·272 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As you trudge through the sewers of Baldur's Gate it dawns on you: where are all the rats?
trans-unit.target: 你在博德之门的下水道费力前行，一个念头自脑际闪过：老鼠都去哪里了？

trans-unit.resname: AFR·273 | Swamp | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Swamp
trans-unit.target: 沼泽

trans-unit.resname: AFR·273 | Swamp | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: You expected to meet hostile drow in this ancient ruin . . . but they fled long ago. What darkness could have driven them out?
trans-unit.target: 你本以为会在这片古老遗迹中遇到怀有敌意的卓尔精灵…但他们早已逃离。连他们都无法抗衡的黑暗究竟是何等面貌？

trans-unit.resname: AFR·274 | Mountain | Card Name
